definition: to prepare students hastily for an impending exam
details:
verb
- to prepare students hastily for an impending exam
- to study intensively, as before an exam
= example: to study intensively, as before an exam
= synonyms: drum
- to crowd or pack to capacity
= example: to crowd or pack to capacity
= synonyms: jam
- to put something somewhere so that the space is completely filled
= example: to put something somewhere so that the space is completely filled
